alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Rankin, central Hinds and southern Madison Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fannin to near Bolton. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bolton around 320 PM CDT. Goshen Springs around 325 PM CDT. Madison around 330 PM CDT. Brownsville around 335 PM CDT. Gluckstadt around 340 PM CDT. Canton around 350 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
